articles.author: Jake Kanter
articles.title: Rebecca Ferguson Says She Asked For “Idiot” Co-Star To Be Replaced With A Tennis Ball After They “Screamed” Abuse & Reduced Her To Tears - Deadline
articles.description: Rebecca Ferguson, the star of 'Dune: Part Two' and 'Mission Impossible,' says she told unnamed co-star to "F off" after they "screamed" at her.
articles.content:
Rebecca Ferguson has revealed how she confronted an unnamed co-star and demanded that they be removed from a film after the individual “screamed” at her.
In an interview with the Reign with Josh Smi… [+1852 chars]
